description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget screen for displaying assigned deliveries in a delivery app. It includes UI components such as app bar, header, and list items with placeholders for delivery list, map, and contact actions.

classes.name: DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the assigned deliveries screen with a scaffold, app bar, and list view containing header and placeholder rows.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A stateless widget for the header section with a gradient background, icon, and title.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A reusable widget representing a row with an icon and text, styled as a card with shadow and rounded corners.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for each widget, arranging layout and styling.
